00041 #ifndef _xmldeclaration_cpp
00042 #define _xmldeclaration_cpp
00043 
00044 #include "xmldeclaration.h"
00045 #include "exception.h"
00046 
00047 #define TIXML_USE_TICPP
00048 #include <ticpp.h>
00049 
00050 namespace phys
00051 {
00052     namespace xml
00053     {
00054         Declaration* Declaration::GetPointerFromWrapped(ticpp::Declaration* Meta)
00055         {
00056             Declaration* Other;
00057             try {
00058                 //Most likely cause of failure is ticpp::Node::GetBasePointer() returns 0
00059                 Other = static_cast<Declaration*>( Meta->GetBasePointer()->GetUserData() );
00060             } catch (ticpp::Exception e) {
00061                 std::stringstream temp;
00062                 temp << "Could not Create phys::xml::Declaration from invalid pointer." << std::endl << e.what() << std::endl << "Details: " << e.m_details;
00063                 throw Exception(temp.str());
00064             }
00065 
00066             //If there is no pointer inside TinyXML to our node, then it doesn't exist, so make it Otherwise use what is there
00067             if(0 == Other)
00068                 { Other = new Declaration(Meta, true); }
00069             return Other;
00070         }
00071 
00072         Declaration::Declaration (ticpp::Declaration* Meta, bool FirstTimeUsed)
00073         {
00074             this->Wrapped = Meta;
00075             if (FirstTimeUsed)
00076                 { this->TakeOwnerOfWrapped(); }
00077         }
00078 
00079         Declaration::Declaration (const String& Version, const String& Encoding, const String& Standalone)
00080         {
00081             this->Wrapped=new ticpp::Declaration(Version, Encoding, Standalone);
00082             this->TakeOwnerOfWrapped();
00083         }
00084 
00085         Declaration::Declaration()
00086         {
00087             this->Wrapped=new ticpp::Declaration();
00088             this->TakeOwnerOfWrapped();
00089         }
00090 
00091         Base::XMLComponentType Declaration::GetType() const
00092             { return Base::isDeclaration; }
00093 
00094         std::istream& Declaration::operator>> (std::istream &In)
00095             { return In >> *(static_cast <ticpp::Declaration*>(this->Wrapped)); }
00096 
00097         std::ostream& Declaration::operator<< (std::ostream &Out)
00098             { return Out << *(static_cast <ticpp::Declaration*>(this->Wrapped)); }
00099 
00100         String Declaration::GetVersion() const
00101             { return static_cast<ticpp::Declaration*>(this->Wrapped)->Version(); }
00102 
00103         String Declaration::GetEncoding() const
00104             { return static_cast<ticpp::Declaration*>(this->Wrapped)->Encoding(); }
00105 
00106         String Declaration::GetStandalone() const
00107             { return static_cast<ticpp::Declaration*>(this->Wrapped)->Standalone(); }
00108 
00109     }// /xml
00110 }// /phys
00111 
00112 #endif
